snippet.title: ChessCraft - Steam Trailer
snippet.description:
Never play the same game of chess again! ChessCraft is a chess sandbox with an AI computer opponent. Customize chess boards, rules, and pieces. Play your creations against a computer opponent, play your creations online with friends, or choose from one of 80 built-in chess boards in adventure mode.


Available now on Google Play. Coming to Steam in 2021.


http://www.chesscraft.ca

https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.FrameOfMindGames.ChessCraft

Thanks to Meydan for the music in this trailer (Etoile danse part 2). I recommend the entire Havor album.

http://freemusicarchive.org/music/Meydan/
